tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    customer_id INT,
    initiative_id INT,
    rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE social_initiatives (
  initiative_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  initiative_name TEXT,
  initiative_description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE customer_details (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(50),
  customer_email VARCHAR(50),
  feedback_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (feedback_id) REFERENCES social_responsibility_feedback(feedback_id)
);

CREATE TABLE feedback_analysis (
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  feedback_id INT,
  analysis_results TEXT,
  feedback_improvement_plan TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (feedback_id) REFERENCES social_responsibility_feedback(feedback_id)
);

CREATE TABLE initiatives (
  initiative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  initiative_name TEXT,
  description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE feedback_analysis (
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  feedback_id INT,
  initiative_id INT,
  sentiment_analysis TEXT,
  feedback_date DATE
);
